resources.string:
This is a monthly magazine for improving your English, with a lot of content like: real English in genuine contexts, slang, british English, practical language, US English, useful expressions, …

Lessons are fun and easy-to-read, with helpful glossaries.

The magazine is for readers from 16 to 105 years old. And the levels range from pre-intermediate to advanced (CEF levels A2-C1).

Other fantastic features of the magazine are: ready-to-use lessons, fantastic 60-minute audio CD, teacherâ€™s notes.

Great website with free material:
http://learnhotenglish.com

Do you feel embarrassed, nervous or shy when you try to speak English? Now you can feel strong and relaxed every time you speak!

Effortless English uses the best research in the world, from top experts such as: Dr. Stephen Krashen, Dr. James Asher, Dr. J. Marvin Brown, Dr. Ashley Hastings, Dr. Brenda Murphy, David Long and Blaine Ray. The research is clear— students who use Effortless English are better speakers than students who use textbooks, grammar, and self-study only.

In every country, in every possible situation, students who learn with Effortless English methods always win against students who use old methods.

Visit:
http://effortlessenglishclub.com
